          java.lang.String value)
        Saves a value to a file
        Parameters:

        value - The String that you want to save in the specified file

      • save

        void save(java.lang.String file,
          java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> value)
        Returns the contents of a file as an ArrayList assuming each line is its own element
        Parameters:
        file - The file to get the ArrayList from.

        java.lang.String getStringPref(java.lang.String key,
                               java.lang.String def)
        Returns a String stored in a Shared Preference
        Parameters:
        key - Unique key for Shared Preference
        def - The default value to return if no such Shared Preference exists
        Returns:
        The value of the Shared Preference, or the default if no such Preference exists
